snippet.title: Overhours Pre-Alpha Teaser
snippet.description:
Overhours is a single-player action tower defense game that plays like an isometric shooter with tower defense elements. Defend against the hordes of office enemies by building, shooting, and strategizing using a variety of weapons at your disposal.

Wishlist us on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2439500/Overhours/
